# include <stdio.h>
# include <string.h>
int main()
{
    int t;
    scanf("%d",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
        char s1[50000],s2[50000];
        int i,flag=0,a[26]={0},b[26]={0};
        scanf("%s",s1);
        scanf("%s",s2);
        if(strlen(s1)==strlen(s2))
        {
            for(i=0;i<strlen(s1);i++)
            {
                a[s1[i]-97]++;
                b[s2[i]-97]++;
            }
            for(i=0;i<strlen(s1);i++)
            {
                if(a[i]!=b[i])
                {
                    flag=1;
                    break;
                }
            }
            if(flag==0)
            printf("YES\n");
            else
            printf("NO\n");
            
            
        }
        else
        printf("NO\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
